description: SSWG/MVM governance invariants and enforcement artifacts (TOML-first, registry-scoped, fail-closed).
rules: Begin all repository interpretation at directive_core/docs.
Treat TOML governance as authoritative only when registered by directive_core/docs/SSWG_CONSTITUTION.toml.
Treat non-TOML files as reference-only; non-TOML content MUST NOT define, amend, or override governance.
Treat directive_core/docs/TERMINOLOGY.toml as the highest semantic authority; undefined terms are forbidden.
Enforce fail-closed and fail-start for any registered governance invalidity; abort at first failure.
Treat ambiguity as CLASS_1_SEVERE; response is fail_abort plus quarantine_artifact.
Return boundary failure notifications as opaque gate identifiers only; emit no descriptive text across boundaries.
Identifier delineation is strict: SSWG/MVM is the governance mindset and ethos identifier; sswg-mvm is the software minimum viable model identifier.
